mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MOVIE_CAST mc USING (SELECT #{personId} AS person_id, #{movieId} AS movie_id FROM DUAL) src ON (mc.person_id = src.person_id AND mc.movie_id = src.movie_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET mc.character_name = #{characterName}, mc.cast_order = #{castOrder} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (person_id, movie_id, character_name, cast_order) VALUES (#{personId}, #{movieId}, #{characterName}, #{castOrder})
